Noncontrolling_Interest_Results_for_Prio.description: Status of noncontrolling interest (NCI) results. You can have these statuses:In Progress: Results have been created but are not yet approved.Canceled: Results have been canceled.Approved: Results have been approved and an NCI journal has been posted.
Displays Yes when Uploaded from Web Service is true, and No when Uploaded from Web Service is false.
